This class provides lots of chance for us to speak and express ourselves, and I really appreciate this! But I think the reading materials and homework can be told earlier. Sometimes it’s a little bit rush to prepare for the requirements.
I hope teacher could let us prepare for the class earlier, like post what we need to read on the weekend instead of Tuesday afternoon. :(
Maybe teacher could post the assignment earlier, like post it on weekend, instead of Tuesday night. It’s too hurry to get the work done, or students often need to stay up late to finish the work.
Actually I want more opportunities to deliver speeches. No more D and D games. But this is really a fun class. I still love it
Maybe teacher can let students know what they should before class earlier, thank you.
